Metadata.MDI: Version v1-2 replaces the underlying COPDEM-30 dataset with version 2021_1, and fixes alignment of COPDEM tiles above 50N and 50S (no change to FABDEM processing). Version v1-1 includes improved handling of tile boundaries in the post-processing, also change metadata to pixel is point
The FABDEM dataset is freely available for non-commercial use under a Creative Commons "CC BY-NC-SA 4.0" licence. For commercial use queries, please contact fabdem@fathom.global
FABDEM v1-2: Forests And Buildings removed CopernicusDEM
